short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto Friend for Facebook will help you auto accept all friend requests or reject all friend requests by 1 click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There're some times we want to accept all new friends request or reject all new friends request on facebook.
Also we maybe want to say hi to all recommended friends on facebook.
If this situation just you are in, try this chrome extension to free your hand by 1 click.
Note, you must be in facebook.com website, you can then open the extension side panel.
If you are visiting other websites, the side panel you could not open it.
You also must click the extension icon or command + B to open side panel, I could not find a way to auto open the side panel.
The extension does only work on facebook.com website.
The extension has no any other intentions but only help you conveniently accept or reject or say hi to facebook friends, without this extension, you could finish the work one by one, with this extension, you could free your hand by 1 click.
